CustodyChainEntry.name: CustodyChainEntry
CustodyChainEntry.description: Represents information about an entry or event in the chain of custody.

AssessmentTaskId.description: The assessment task for which a custody chain entry is created.

CustodianId.description: The user, organization, or location that has custody of the item.

CustodyItemId.description: The parent custody item that's associated with the custody chain entry record.

Description.description: The description of the custody chain entry record of the item.

EndDateTime.description: The end date and time of custody chain entry the item.

ItemCustodySiteId.description: The place where the item is held in custody.

ItemVerificationType.description: Specifies the type of verification for the item.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the custody chain entry record.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The stage, step, task, or any custom object for which the custody entry is created.

StartDateTime.description: The start date and time of custody chain entry for the item.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the custody entry record. Picklist values aren't predefined for this field. Before you create a record, ensure that your Salesforce admin has defined picklist values based on your organizationâ€™s requirement.

StatusCategory.description: Specifies the category of the custody entry record's status.
